author: unknown
message:
docs: Rename Main concepts to Understanding Angular, Built-in Features to Developer Guides (#39930)

PR Close #39930

files.patch:
@@ -94,7 +94,7 @@
       ]

-      "title": "Main Concepts",
+      "title": "Understanding Angular",
